typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ORDERID as string,
		CUSTOMERID as string,
		EMPLOYEEID as string,
		ORDERDATE as string,
		REQUIREDDA as string,
		SHIPPEDDAT as string,
		SHIPVIA as string,
		FREIGHT as string,
		SHIPNAME as string,
		SHIPADDRES as string,
		SHIPCITY as string,
		SHIPREGION as string,
		SHIPPOSTAL as string,
		SHIPCOUNTR as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['orders/*.parquet']) ~> Orders
source(output(
		ORDERID as string,
		CUSTOMERID as string,
		EMPLOYEEID as string,
		ORDERDATE as string,
		REQUIREDDA as string,
		SHIPPEDDAT as string,
		SHIPVIA as string,
		FREIGHT as string,
		SHIPNAME as string,
		SHIPADDRES as string,
		SHIPCITY as string,
		SHIPREGION as string,
		SHIPPOSTAL as string,
		SHIPCOUNTR as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['customers/*.parquet']) ~> Customers
DerivedColumn1, Customers join(Orders@ORDERID == Customers@ORDERID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		ORDERID = Orders@ORDERID,
		CUSTOMERID = Orders@CUSTOMERID,
		SHIPNAME = Orders@SHIPNAME,
		SHIPADDRES = Orders@SHIPADDRES,
		SHIPCITY = Orders@SHIPCITY,
		SHIPREGION = Orders@SHIPREGION,
		SHIPPOSTAL = Orders@SHIPPOSTAL,
		SHIPCOUNTR = Orders@SHIPCOUNTR,
		ORDERID = Customers@ORDERID,
		CUSTOMERID = Customers@CUSTOMERID,
		EMPLOYEEID = Customers@EMPLOYEEID,
		REQUIREDDA = Customers@REQUIREDDA,
		SHIPPEDDAT = Customers@SHIPPEDDAT,
		SHIPVIA = Customers@SHIPVIA,
		FREIGHT = Customers@FREIGHT,
		SHIPNAME = Customers@SHIPNAME,
		SHIPADDRES = Customers@SHIPADDRES,
		SHIPCITY = Customers@SHIPCITY,
		SHIPREGION = Customers@SHIPREGION,
		SHIPPOSTAL = Customers@SHIPPOSTAL,
		SHIPCOUNTR = Customers@SHIPCOUNTR
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Orders derive(ORDERID = uuid()) ~> DerivedColumn1
Select1 sink(input(
		ORDERID as string,
		CUSTOMERID as string,
		EMPLOYEEID as string,
		ORDERDATE as string,
		REQUIREDDA as string,
		SHIPPEDDAT as string,
		SHIPVIA as string,
		FREIGHT as string,
		SHIPNAME as string,
		SHIPADDRES as string,
		SHIPCITY as string,
		SHIPREGION as string,
		SHIPPOSTAL as string,
		SHIPCOUNTR as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
